00053 /*
00054  * Convert an unsigned long integer to a string.
00055  *
00056  * @param num the number to convert
00057  * @return the resulting string
00058  */
00059 string Utils::itos(unsigned long int num)
00060 {
00061     stringstream s;
00062     s << num;
00063     return s.str();
00064 }
00065

00105 /*
00106  * Convert a string to a float.
00107  *
00108  * @param num the number string to convert.
00109  * @return the resulting float
00110  */
00111 float Utils::stof(string num)
00112 {
00113     istringstream s(num);
00114     float f;
00115     s >> f;
00116     return f;
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 /*
00121  * Test to see if a string starts with a string.
00122  *
00123  * @param substring the sting to test for.
00124  * @param fullstring the string to search from the beginning.
00125  * @return bool true if fullsting starts with substring.
00126  */
00127 bool Utils::startsWith(string substring, string fullstring)
00128 {
00129     if(fullstring.compare((size_t)0, substring.size(), substring))
00130         return false;
00131     else
00132         return true;
00133 }
00134 
00135 /*
00136  * Draw text on the curses screen with a color.
00137  *
00138  * @param y the y position on the screen.
00139  * @param x the x position on the screen.
00140  * @param color the color number. Depends on the screen setup.
00141  * @param text the text to display.
00142  */
00143 void Utils::drawColorText(int y, int x, int color, string text)
00144 {
00145     move(y, x);
00146     attrset(COLOR_PAIR(color));
00147     addstr(text.c_str());
00148     attrset(COLOR_PAIR(0));
00149 }
00150 
00151 /*
00152  * Draw one space in a color.
00153  *
00154  * @param y the y position on the screen.
00155  * @param x the x position on the screen.
00156  * @param color the color number. Depends on the screen setup.
00157  */
00158 void Utils::drawSquare(int y, int x, int color)
00159 {
00160     move(y, x-1);
00161     attrset(COLOR_PAIR(color));
00162     addstr("   ");
00163     attrset(COLOR_PAIR(0));
00164 }
